briefTitle: Study to Compare Gastric Inhibition of Two Proton Pump Inhibitors (CL2008-18)(P07815)(COMPLETED)
officialTitle: Randomized, Crossover, Pharmacodynamic Study Comparing the Effects of Two Proton Pump Inhibitors
summary: This study will determine differences between Proton Pump Inhibitors (PPI) formulations relative to their effects on gastric acidity.

primaryOutcome.measure: Achievement of Sustained Difference in Inhibition of Intragastric Acidity Based on Median pH Values Between the Two Active Study Treatments at Steady-state on Day 7
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Treatment dose to 4-hr post-dose on Day 7
